quote.text: Never feared Death. Always thought, 'Will embrace it like a brother and walk with it to the after life'. But something has changed. After I saw your eyes brimming with love for me, I knew when Death arrives and I will take a look at you eyes and if there is even a glimpse of love in those pearl like eyes, I will pull out my sword, glare at death and roar 'Not Today'
quote.author: AAuutthhoorr NNaammee
